title: UT Austin Perry-Castañeda Library — Kansas Historical Topographic Maps
description: Index of scanned historical Kansas topographic maps hosted by UT Austin PCL. Use for discovery; download sheets and curate locally as COG overlays.

endpoints.notes: Landing/index page listing Kansas topo scans; follow links to sheet images.

license: Public Domain (USGS scans; hosting policies may vary — cite PCL when appropriate)

processing: Selection of Kansas sheets relevant to study area
Local georeferencing and conversion to COG (JPEG-in-COG) with neatline handling
provenance.notes: UT PCL provides access to scanned sheets. Rights for USGS historical maps are generally Public Domain; include courtesy citation to PCL.

consumers.notes: This is an index source. Use it to discover sheets; the actual map layers consumed by viewers should be your curated local COGs.
